topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5591f47563687268fb0006da#post_5591f47563687268fb0006da
Terminator 2 was grand and so was Terminator 1. The third movie was no different than the Matrix. Just a bunch of special effects and fight scenes without the actual story. The fourth is a bit better than the third but not as good as the first. A close second to the first though.

I don't know what to expect but whatever it is, I will not regret watching it.
